description:
This is a scalar market on the amount of ETH that will be burned from when EIP-1559 was implemented to September 5, 2021, 12:00 PM ET. The lower bound for this market is 50,000 ETH and the upper bound is 250,000 ETH.

The resolution source for this market will be https://etherchain.org/burn, under “Total burned.” The resolution source will be checked at exactly September 5, 2021, 12:00 PM ET. If data is not available on the webpage at that time, another credible source will be chosen by the MIC to resolve the market. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

You can use the calculator to the right (underneath the Buy modal) to calculate how each Long or Short Token price corresponds with ETH burned. Long and Short shares will settle proportionally to the outcome value if the final value is between these bounds, but if the final value exceeds either the upper or lower bound, the price of each Outcome Token is capped at $1 and $0. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

events.title: How much ETH will be burned one month after EIP-1559 was implemented?

question: How much ETH will be burned one month after EIP-1559 was implemented?
